name: Empty the Petri Dish
description:
Trijam 153: Theme - "Empty World"

Use a Magnifying glass to get rid of the organisms in the petri dish as fast as you can!

Clear the petri dish as fast as you can.  Upgrades appear every 5 seconds.  Red upgrades increase the size of your burn, and green increases the speed of your movement.

Empty a "world" by destroying everything in it.  I wanted to simulate a little world, so I made a petri dish of little squares that move around randomly.  Afterward, I thought, "How should I destroy these things?"  Burn them with a magnifying glass.

Made with Godot Engine in about 2 hours and 40 minutes.

Instructions:

Navigate around with your mouse

Space to start the game

Esc to quit

Credits:

Upgrade icons https://opengameart.org/content/upgrade-symbols
